title: husbandawake
body:
Mr.Frog: Oh hello?
->Hi Mr.Frog, I'm a detective, can you tell me about what happened?
    Mr.Frog: I was already in bed when I woke up from the sound of someone breaking a window in the house, I went downstairs to look and tried to get to the kitchen for something to protect myself in case it was a burglar, but the killer was already there. He hit me over the head and I just blacked out. When I woke up, I saw him rummaging through the pantry. I think he saw me wake up and he just walked out like it was no big deal...
    <<set $talked_to_husband to true>> //pantry now has more dialogue
->I'm sorry about Mrs. Frog.
    Mr.Frog: My poor wifey...!
->Why do you have your brother's ID on you?
    Mr.Frog: U-um, he forgot it at my house and I w-was going to return it to him soon!
<<if $solvednote is true>>
->Does this note mean anything to you?
    Mr.Frog: S-sometimes we don't have enough money to put food on the table, and Frog Jr. has to go without lunch...
